DOC.brief_summary: This observational study conduct patient receive statin treatment secondary prevention coronary heart disease current standard care compliance European guideline . The purpose study evaluate percentage patient reach target LDL level . Additionally study measure patient 's compliance treatment assess counting return tablet . Both assessment make visit conduct 6-8 week first visit 28-32 week first visit .
DOC.brief_title: Compliance With LDL-Lowering Therapy ( Study P05467 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: willingness participate study 18 year age clinically establish cardiovascular disease consider patient secondary prevention prior therapy statin without achieve goal ( 2.5 mmol/L LDL cholesterol ) last lipid check perform
